control.description-key: Input column with toggle visibility for sensitive data like passwords or confidential information.

property.name: maskedColumn
property.description-key: The column containing the data to be masked/unmasked.

property.name: regexColumn
property.description-key: Optional regex pattern to specify which characters to mask. Examples: /./g (all), /[a-zA-Z]/g (letters only), /[0-9]/g (numbers only). Leave empty to mask all characters.

property.name: maskCharColumn
property.description-key: The character to use for masking (default: *). Examples: *, •, -, #, X
